name: The Ice Machine
description:
You're an ice cube single-handedly keeping one of those fancy drink machines running by filling orders as fast as possible.

Move: WASD, space to jump

Collect all the orders and get to the pipe to move to the next level.

This was created for the Godot Wild Jam

Theme: Assembly Required

Diversifier: Temperature

Credits:

game designed and developed in tandem with https://owenlevin.itch.io/
